title: Handle a Rush Order
description: A customer places a last-minute rush order and needs it to ship today.

tasks.description: Receive the rush order and flag it with high priority in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is created and marked as urgent.

tasks.description: Immediately generate a pick list and send it to the warehouse floor.
tasks.expected_outcome: The pick list is sent to a warehouse worker's handheld device.

tasks.description: Arrange for an expedited shipping service (e.g., overnight air) and generate the label.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects an overnight shipping option.

tasks.description: Ensure the order is picked, packed, and ready for the carrier pickup.
tasks.expected_outcome: The warehouse team prepares the order in time for the final pickup of the day.
